original_text: When Christ came, he told people God's good news about peace. He told that message to you Gentiles, who were far away from God. He also told it to us Jews, who were near to God.
korean_text: 또 오셔서 먼 데 있는 너희에게 평안을 전하시고 가까운 데 있는 자들에게 평안을 전하셨으니

sentences.original_text: he told people God's good news about peace
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게 평화에 대한 하나님의 좋은 소식을 전하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He told that message to you Gentiles
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 메시지를 당신 이방인들에게 전하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: who were far away from God
He also told it to us Jews
